actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize financial assistance for service, employment, and redevelopment centers.
short_title: Service, Employment, and Redevelopment (SER) Assistance Act

summary.text: Service, Employment, and Redevelopment (SER) Assistance Act - Directs the Secretary of Labor to make financial assistance available for the establishment and operation of service, employment, and redevelopment centers. States that such centers shall offer classes specifically designed to assist disadvantaged unemployed and underemployed Spanish-speaking persons. Specifies additional education, employment, and training services to be included in the service, employment and redevelopment program.

titles.title: Service, Employment, and Redevelopment (SER) Assistance Act
A bill to authorize financial assistance for service, employment, and redevelopment centers.
